metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000190 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
SimpleXML (latest version 2.7.1) is vulnerable to an XXE vulnerabilityresulting SSRF, information disclosure, DoS and so on.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsimple-xml-java - 2.7.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simple-xml package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-3').
